name: Before Sunset
description:
A curse has been unleashed upon the village. Ah-Dan discovers a lead to the mysteries and horrors behind the curse, digging deeper into the disturbing truth about the dark side of the village. Never wander after sunset, no matter what.


  • Terrifying Antagonists
  • Story rich to get you entangled with.
  • Interesting and creepy puzzles around the entire game.
  • Animated Illustrations to disturb you further.
  • A very atmospheric environment that consists of day and night.
  • Additional side stories and hidden lore for you to dig around
  • An unlockable gallery.


Hi, I'm Justus Yew, the game creator of Before Sunset. Before Sunset is a game inspired by an old village me and my sister used to visit, the hometown of our grandparents. We had one of the best memories there, and creating Before Sunset became a must as a tribute to our childhood.

It's been a long 1.5 years of hard work, me and my game artist has been aiming for this game to be a complete step up from our previous game Noctambulant.

We are very excited to finally launch the game. Enjoy!
